ja444:7.2: adaṃsī → adaṃsi (bj) | aḍaṃsī (sya1ed, sya2ed) | aḍatthi (pts-vp-pli1ed), sacarā → bilarā (bj) | biḷārā (sya1ed, sya2ed) | patarā (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja444:9.2: eḷamūgova bālo → eḷamūgo capalo (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr) | elamūgo va bālo (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja444:9.5: Viññuppasatthañca satañca ṭhānaṃ → viññūpasatthañca satañca ṭhānaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed) | viññūpasatthaṃ vasitaṃ ca ṭhānaṃ (mr)
ja444:11.4: antimagandhano → gandhino (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
ja444:13.6: paddhacarāmhi → baddhacarāsmi (bj) | paṭṭhacarāmi (sya1ed, sya2ed) | baddhacarāmi (pts-vp-pli1ed) | paṭṭhacarāmhi (mr)
ja444:14.1: bhāsiṃ yamabhāsaneyyaṃ → bhāsissaṃ abhāsaneyyaṃ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed) | bhāsissa'mabhāsaneyyaṃ (?)
